cshelp.title: Storage
cshelp.shortdesc: The Storage page shows information about host system storage information.

csbody.p: Use these sections to configure storage of the host system.

dlentry.dd: LVM (logical volume management) provides a method of allocating space on mass-storage devices that is more flexible than conventional partitioning schemes.
File system used to control how data stored and retrieved from storage device.
Swap device is repository of memory segments that are paged out of physical RAM. Swap space can be of partition of file.
Storage device is any computing hardware that is used for storing, porting and extracting data files and objects.
FCP Tape device is any computing hardware that is used for storing, porting and extracting data files and objects. This feature is available for s390x architecture.
A SAN Adapter is IO device used to connect to the remote SAN storage devices. This feature is available for s390x architecture.
